segments.text: Dam it , I'm running out of money again , I really need to balance my budget and handle my money better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You did spend too much , and most of the expense was kind of unnecessary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you don't have to spend every penny you make , you could save some every month , like a lot of other people do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I work hard so I deserve to enjoy , but that costs money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should save in case of an emergency , you need to have more self-control , what things did you spend money on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The problem is that I have no idea . I didn't pay attention .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's bygones be bygones , start saving right now .
segments.speaker: S2
